basics.name: Sharon Reese
basics.label: IT Helpdesk Manager & ServiceNow Administrator
basics.summary: Seasoned professional with extensive experience supporting large-scale production environments for Federal Student Aid programs. Demonstrates strategic planning and the ability to excel in high-stress, fast-paced settings. Proven expertise in team building, client relations, and production development.

work.name: Maximus
work.summary: Managed a Helpdesk Team of 13 members, overseeing high-volume ticket submissions and assignments with precise handling.
highlights: Configured and set up assignment queues in ServiceNow.
Assisted with process improvements and new initiatives in ServiceNow to support Helpdesk calls for the Aidvantage/USDS contract.
Supported access request and termination submissions via ServiceNow for various systems.

work.name: Maximus
work.summary: Managed interface/production planning and output, providing both management and technical leadership.
highlights: Managed Tier 1 Helpdesk staff, growing ticket submissions from 13,000 to 51,000 annually.
Conducted thorough quality checks of raw materials, processes, and output.
Prepared and participated in production audits/inspections for A123 audits and SSAE with supporting artifacts.

work.name: ACS/Xerox
work.summary: Managed interface/production planning and output, providing both management and technical leadership.
highlights: Directed subordinates to complete assignments using established guidelines, procedures, and policies.
Assisted in the development of business policies and conducted special business-related studies.
Developed recommendations on areas needing cost reduction and process or profit improvement.

skills.name: Security Awareness and Code of Conduct

awards.title: Recognized for support of the DLSS transfer to Nelnet platform
awards.summary: This was a large data conversion effort consisting of records for more than fourteen million borrowers and fifty million loans converted through building and processing more than 2,100 formatted conversion files.
